official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to reinstate provisions under which cost-of-living adjustments for Federal annuitants would be made twice each year.

summary.text: Requires semiannual (currently annual) cost of living adjustments in civil service annuities to reflect increases in the Consumer Price Index.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to reinstate provisions under which cost-of-living adjustments for Federal annuitants would be made twice each year.
